descriptionHtml:
I made this for myself.
This mod adds Mammoth Ivory bows and arrows to Skyrim + has 5 different types of custom arrows, some of them have devastating magic effects

Bows are craftable at Smithing Forge , required \"Ebony Smithing\" Perk
Arrows can be crafted at Forge too but in \"MISC\" section they also require Ebony Smithing Perk

Items required to craft arrows may not be easy to get but that\'s the point ;) since they are pretty powerful - You can always cheat tho ;P not for me to judge.

Full list of items here:
-----------[[BOWS]]----------

Ivory Bow
-----------
Base Damage : 15
No special effects, Enchantable

Ivory Bow \"Scorpid\"
-----------
Base Damage : 15
All arrows shot from this bow cause 30 poison damage over 3 sec

Ivory Bow \"Shard\"
-----------
Base Damage : 15
All arrows shot from this bow cause 20 bleeding damage over 6 sec

-----------[[ARROWS]]----------

Ivory Arrow - 18 Damage

Ivory Arrow (Diamond Tipped) - 38 damage , increased projectile speed and range

Ivory Arrow (Fire) - Explodes dealing 80 fire damage + 40 over 3 sec , Staggers opponents , has chance to apply \"Fiery Payback\" effect which disarms your enemies

Ivory Arrow (Ice) - Explodes dealing 90 frost damage + 30 over 2 sec , Staggers opponents , has chance to freeze enemies in solid ice for 10 sec

Ivory Arrow (Lightning) - Explodes dealing 100 shock damage + 20 over 1 sec , Staggers opponents , has a chance to cause \"Temporary muscle paralys\" knocking down your enemies.


==============KNOWN ISSUES AND BUGS======================

1. Enemies may loot the arrows and use it against Player which can be fatal cause arrows are pretty powerful.
2. Dropping any of the bows cause them to appear in weird places or vanish under map (I don\'t know how to fix it im so sorry :( )

If you find any more issues please let me know
author: DrOuroboros
